4001.caption: Network Activity
4001.description: Network Activity events report network connection and traffic activity.

4007.caption: SSH Activity
4007.description: SSH Activity events report remote client connections to a server using the Secure Shell (SSH) Protocol.

4009.caption: RFB Activity
4009.description: Remote Frame Buffer Protocol (RFB) Activity events report remote client connections to a server as seen on the network.

4008.caption: FTP Activity
4008.description: File Transfer Protocol (FTP) Activity events report file transfers between a server and a client as seen on the network.

4002.caption: HTTP Activity
4002.description: HTTP Activity events report HTTP connection and traffic information.

4005.caption: RDP Activity
4005.description: Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) Activity events report remote client connections to a server as seen on the network.

4010.caption: SMTP Activity
4010.description: SMTP Activity events report email communications using the Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP).

4003.caption: DNS Activity
4003.description: DNS Activity events report DNS queries and answers as seen on the network.
